summary: REQ-15 appears implemented by updating RELATIONSHIP_START_DATE in frontend/src/valentine/config.ts to 2025-12-12, which would yield ~64 days as of mid-Feb 2026. No evidence in the diff summary indicates any changes to the counter component or its label/suffix text.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/docs (frontend-file-summaries.txt) describing config date and other components, which was not requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the configured relationship start date so the counter renders 64; it did not request updating summary/metadata files.
BuildRequest did not request changes to project state/versioning metadata; only the config date change was required.
